amendment.description: An amendment numbered 35 printed in the Congressional Record to include additional language excluding instances when the Secretary may not execute the first drawdown of petroleum products in the Reserve and changes the effective date of the bill.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to include additional language excluding instances when the Secretary may not execute the first drawdown of petroleum products in the Reserve and changes the effective date of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A044) Failed by recorded vote: 205 - 224 (Roll no. 70).
